text: Ihar Yuryevich Tsaplyuk (; , Igor Yuryevich Tsaplyuk; born 15 July 1970) is a former Belarusian football player. Between 2004 and 2010 he worked at Torpedo Zhodino as director and sports director. Since 2012, he is working at Football Federation of Belarus. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Belarusian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Starye Dorogi players Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:FC Luninets players Category:FC Granit Mikashevichi players Category:FC Torpedo-BelAZ Zhodino players Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk players
title: Ihar Tsaplyuk
